pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Introduction[![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/osdu-client.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/osdu-client/)`osdu-client` is a python library implementing a simple OSDU client with an abstracted-out authorization backend.# Instalation```pip install osdu-client```# ExampleOSDU API client can be adjusted to specific OSDU deployment by defining auth backend according to `AuthBackendInterface` methods.```pythonfrom typing import Dictfrom osdu_client import OSDUAPIfrom osdu_client.auth import AuthBackendInterfaceclass AuthBackend(AuthBackendInterface): def __init__(self, headers, base_url) -> None: self._headers = headers self._base_url = base_url def get_headers(self) -> Dict: return self._headers def get_base_url(self) -> str: return self._osdu_base_url def get_sd_connection_params(self, log_level: int = None) -> Dict: return {}auth_backend = AuthBackend( headers={"Authorization": "Bearer XYZ"}, base_url="https://exmaple.com")storage_client = OSDUAPI.client('storage', auth_backend=auth_backend)response = storage_client.get_record_versions(id="123")```
